name: Elba HR İnsan Kaynakları Eğitim ve Danışmanlık AŞ
description: Provider of a cloud-based recruitment platform designed to help HR practitioners to utilize digital and analytical technologies. The company's platform to help in talent acquisition process and create the better teams for business with lower turn-over, higher performance, enabling users to target the candidates via employer-branded advertisements and video-enabled digital screening.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based recruitment platform designed to help HR practitioners to utilize digital and analytical technologies. The company's platform to help in talent acquisition process and create the better teams for business with lower turn-over, higher performance, enabling users to target the candidates via employer-branded advertisements and video-enabled digital screening.
